title: MEAS MAT_SCI 395-0-22 Special Topics in Materials Science and Engineering

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Bridge the gap between the fundamental principles taught in electromagnetismand its real world application to materials science, information and energy storage.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Suggested)
descriptions.value:
Lectures on Physics (Vol 2, Feynman),
Emerging Non-volatile Memories (Eds. S. Hong, O. Auciello, D. Wouters),
Nanoscale Phenomena in Ferroelectric Thin Films (Ed. S. Hong),
Lithium Batteries: Science and Technology (Eds. Nazri and Pistoia)

subject: MAT_SCI
